en.title: CloudMile | Your Trusted Partner for Digital Transformation
en.desc: CloudMile is a leading AI and cloud service company that empowers enterprises by utilizing machine learning, big data, and Google Cloud services.

zh.title: CloudMile | 值得您信賴的數位轉型夥伴
zh.desc: CloudMile 為亞洲領先人工智慧服務與雲端供應商，致力於實踐 AI 成為企業成長動能。

en.title: Embrace Digital Transformation for the Future | CloudMile
en.desc: Digital transformation is the key for anyone to stay competitive in the future market. We ensure a seamless transformation via our cloud and AI services.

zh.title: 數位轉型顧問 | CloudMile
zh.desc: 從數位策略開始，CloudMile 為您提供從商業策略顧問、技術評估、雲端與人工智慧科技導入，協助您轉型成為決策靈活、技術整合的數位型企業。

en.title: Transform Your IT Systems and Stay Competitive | CloudMile
en.desc: We help businesses to stay ahead of the competition in the era of cloud computing by upgrading their IT systems. Check out our services.

zh.title: IT 架構現代化 | CloudMile
zh.desc: 從升級基礎架構開始，透過雲端搬遷、資料倉儲現代化、混合雲與多雲架構與應用程式現代化，我們能為您建造最適合數位時代的 IT 基礎架構。

en.title: Make Smart Decisions with Data-driven Approach | CloudMile
en.desc: Boost your company's performance and stay competitive in the market through data-driven business decisions that utilize ML, big data, and data applications.

zh.title: 數據導向解決方案 | CloudMile
zh.desc: CloudMile 可提供從最基礎的數據蒐集、數據處理，到數據視覺化與數據分析中所有必要的技術服務。我們可為您打造數據驅動模式，極大化數據的商業價值。

en.title: Make Cloud Management Smart and Simple | CloudMile
en.desc: MileLync can help you to efficiently manage cloud cost, optimize cloud resources and make data-driven decisions.
en.keywords: MileLync, Cloud Management Platform, cloud cost management, data visualization, google cloud platform

zh.title: MileLync 輕鬆掌握智慧化的雲端管理 | CloudMile
zh.desc: MileLync 幫助您更有效率地管理雲端成本、優化雲端資源並且根據數據制定商業決策。
zh.keywords: MileLync, 雲端管理平台, 雲端成本管理, 資料視覺化, 雲端資源, google cloud platform

en.title: MileCDN: Unleash Your Website's Power | CloudMile
en.desc: Want to target the Chinese market? Our MileCDN is an ICP license-free cloud platform that allows your website to be accessed by the target Chinese audience.

zh.title: 多重 CDN 平台 | CloudMile
zh.desc: MileCDN 是一個 Multi-CDN 服務管理平臺，讓您無須煩惱申請 ICP 許可證相關事宜，便能提供位於中國的使用者穩定的體驗。

en.title: Business Productivity by Innovative Communication | CloudMile
en.desc: Embrace an innovative way of the working environment that impacts your business' productivity. Check out our cutting-edge customized productivity solutions

zh.title: 商業生產力 | CloudMile

en.title: Make the Most of IT Transformation via Cloud | CloudMile
